ml.clustering

Class Clustering

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.clustering.Clustering
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KMeans, L1NMF, SpectralClustering

    public abstract class Clustering
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for clustering algorithms.
    Version:
    1.0, Jan. 30th, 2014
    Author:
    Mingjie Qian

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Matrix centers
      Basis matrix (nClus x nFeature).
      protected Matrix dataMatrix
      Data matrix (nExample x nFeature), each row is a feature vector
      protected Matrix indicatorMatrix
      Cluster indicator matrix (nExample x nClus).
      int nClus
      Number of clusters.
      int nExample
      Number of examples.
      int nFeature
      Number of features.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Clustering()
      Default constructor for this clustering algorithm.
      Clustering(ClusteringOptions clusteringOptions)
      Constructor for this clustering algorithm initialized with options wrapped in a ClusteringOptions object.
      Clustering(int nClus)
      Constructor for this clustering algorithm given number of clusters to be set.

        Default constructor for this clustering algorithm.

        Constructor for this clustering algorithm initialized with options wrapped in a ClusteringOptions object.
        Parameters:
        clusteringOptions - clustering options

        Constructor for this clustering algorithm given number of clusters to be set.

    • Method Detail

      • feedData

        public void feedData(Matrix dataMatrix)
        Feed training data for this clustering algorithm.
        Parameters:
        dataMatrix - an nExample x nFeature data matrix with each row being a data example

      • feedData

        public void feedData(double[][] data)
        Feed training data for this feature selection algorithm.
        Parameters:
        data - an nExample x nFeature 2D double array with each row being a data example

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Matrix G0)
        Initialize the indicator matrix.
        Parameters:
        G0 - initial indicator matrix

      • clustering

        public abstract void clustering()
        Do clustering. Please call initialize() before using this method.

      • clustering

        public void clustering(Matrix G0)
        Do clustering with a specified initializer. Please use null if you want to use random initialization.
        Parameters:
        G0 - initial indicator matrix, if null random initialization will be used

      • getData

        public Matrix getData()
        Fetch data matrix.
        Returns:
        an nExample x nFeature data matrix

      • getCenters

        public Matrix getCenters()
        Get cluster centers.
        Returns:
        an nClus x nFeature basis matrix

      • getIndicatorMatrix

        public Matrix getIndicatorMatrix()
        Get cluster indicator matrix.
        Returns:
        an nExample x nClus cluster indicator matrix

      • getAccuracy

        public static double getAccuracy(Matrix G,
                 Matrix groundTruth)
        Evaluating the clustering performance of this clustering algorithm by using the ground truth.
        Parameters:
        G - predicted cluster indicator matrix
        groundTruth - true cluster assignments
        Returns:
        evaluation metrics
